OUR HIGHLIGHTS: Greece
Visit Osios Loukas, a historic, walled monastery and one of the most important monuments of Middle Byzantine architecture and art.
See Delphi, the site of the 4th-century BC Temple of Apollo. And then on to Epidaurus, known for its impressive theatre, it was once the most celebrated healing centre.
TOUR HIGHLIGHTS: Egypt
Once you arrive in Alexandria, visit Pompey’s Pillar, a triumphal Roman column and the Catacombs of Kom El Shoqafa – one of the Seven Wonders of the Middle Ages.
Enjoy a 2-night stay in Cairo and visit the great Pyramids of Giza and the famous Sphinx, enjoy a trip to Memphis, followed by dinner on a Nile cruise.
